cap.theme: Light or dark theme of the application

err.selectDiffImg: The image doesn't exist. Please select a different image.
err.selectDiffFile: The file doesn't exist. Please select a different file.
err.fileTooLarge: The file is too large. Please select a smaller file or a higher resolution image.
err.extTooLong: The file extension is too long. Only files with extension up to 5 characters are supported.
err.only3Chan: Only images with three color channels are supported.
err.revealFail: Revealing of the file failed. This image either does not contain secret data or you have entered an incorrect decryption key.
err.permDeny: Permission to external local storage was denied.

inf.part1: Welcome to the Steganosaurus app. This application allows you to hide any binary file in an image without changing the size of the resulting image in any way. The application uses a proprietary key-driven algorithm that guarantees the safety of the hidden data from attackers.
inf.part2: Do not edit or compress the image with hidden data in any way, this could lead to loss of secret data in the image.
